subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Margaret Downey/SJ Allophones/ThePeopleAreTalking.mp3 
  Uploaded by : itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> 
  Description : This is my first attempt using the SJ Allophones file and SoundSoap2 software in order to manually sweep it.  I asked, "How does this work?" And I received an immediate response which I'm hearing as, "I HAVE TO SAY THE PEOPLE ARE TALKING, BUT I DON'T REALLY CARE."  note:  Raw clip.  No alterations to timing or otherwise. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Margaret%20Downey/SJ%20Allophones/ThePeopleAreTalking.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

itcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...>
